name: Sweet Dreams | Tavolino - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Sweet Dreams, designed by DRAW Studio in 2020 for Ceccotti Collezioni, is a coffee table made from solid American walnut, featuring a slender line. It has refined handcrafted brass details and a double tier, with the lower tier always made of 8 mm tempered glass, while the upper tier can be either marble or glass. The Sweet Dreams coffee table echoes the design language of the namesake bed, combining functionality with a design focused on lightness.
